alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 1:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern La Paz, west central Yuma and east central Imperial Counties through 145 PM MST/145 PM PDT/... At 102 PM MST/102 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wellton, or 12 miles east of Fortuna Foothills, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinez Lake, Fortuna Foothills, Wellton, Blaisdell, Kinter, Ligurta and Yuma Proving Ground. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 17 and 37. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 35 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Yuma
